brainly_data.question: What is one way in european politics changed because of expansion and global trade during the 15th to 18th centuries
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: What is one way in european politics changed because of expansion and global trade during the 15th to 18th centuries
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: They were changed from a more conseritive way of thinking to a more liberal way of thinking since they had to account for all the new types of cultures and races that were now part of their empire
